review.comment: Love it!! 	Hamadan RUG

review.comment: I am so happy I found this website after struggling to find affordable rugs for months. I got a runner for my kitchen for $30! Granted it was part of a clearance deal but I would’ve even paid the full price if not for the sale. It was shipped and delivered super fast and I couldn’t be happier with it! All my future rug purchases will be through this site!
review.review_reply: HI Savannah, Here is a 10% off code for yuor next order: rtn

review.comment: Very pleased with Rugs2Go.  Ordering was seamless and received the carpet within a few days.  Nice looking carpet as shown online and appreciated the unpacking and care email post delivery.  Would order from this company again.
review.review_reply: Here is a 10% off code for your next order: rtn

review.comment: Really great selection of area rugs.  Prices are extremely good for this quality level of rug.  Searching the site was easy with nice quality pictures, descriptions, sizes, and customer reviews. Checking out was easy and the shipping was free. I am very pleased so far.
review.review_reply: Here is a 10% off code for your next order: rtn

review.comment:
I bought two large area carpets and came out misaligned pattern and design. Requested free return over obvious defects on carpet as seen in the pictures. A complete different color tones from one side to another. They reject my request and claimed its not defective!!

update: color tones changes mostly occurs based on light reflection i noticed. Depends on the angle you view. So, its not actual color defect! Since its printed, i could tell slight imperfections on patterns/design.
It was great. Thank you. Sooo fast
review.review_reply: Here is a 10% off code for your next order: rtn

review.comment: Beauty. Absolutely gorgeous.
review.review_reply: Here is a 10% off code for your next order: rtn

review.comment: Your clearance sale prices were GREAT.  So I made a purchase.  Also I really like the way you have your web site set up.  Easy to follow & view the rugs.  Excellent job.
review.review_reply: Here is a 10% off code for your next order: rtn

review.comment: The rug looks about 5 shades lighter than the pictures online. I wanted a dark lush colored rug and ended up with a light pastel rug.  I’ve tried contacting customer service multiple times but no one will respond.

Very happy with the rug--very colorful, nice and flat.  Even a bit brighter than expected.  The rug was lost by FedEx but Rugs2Go sent another without discussion.  The service was patient, polite and immediate.,
review.review_reply: Hi Diana! We're so happy to know the rug worked well in your space, we really appreciate your patience and your support!

review.comment: Ordered two rugs and they are just gorgeous!  Nice quality and very true to the color on the website  Great selection and you just can’t beat the prices!  Fast delivery too!  Would definitely recommend Rugs2Go and will order from them again.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much Noelene! Your support means the world to us and we love hearing that both rugs worked well

review.comment: Snappy delivery, probably thanks to good packaging.  Lovely look, fits great with my room.
review.review_reply: Hi Eli! Thanks so much for sharing your experience, we love hearing that it was a perfect fit!

review.comment: bold pattern, great density, bought the runner to be sure and even my daughter the designer likes it.
review.review_reply: We're really happy that the rugs hwlped impress a total pro! Thanks so much for your support :)

review.comment: I made a rug purchase from Rugs2Go of a one of a kind rug. The delivery was quick, less than a week. The rug itself is gorgeous and so soft. Not usually a fan of polypropylene but this is very very nice. Plus my dogs love it so it is pup-approved. I will be making more purchases from Rug2Go.
review.review_reply:
Hi Leilani, We're really happy to know that you (and the pups) love it :)
Thanks for your support!

review.comment: Liked the ease to order. Waiting for the delivery now.
I have purchased two rugs. They are perfect for my home. I got them quickly as well! The colors are incredible. The ones I chose are warm with reds and golds. There will be more!
review.review_reply: Thanks for sharing your experience Rob :) It really does inspire our team to keep going!

review.comment: Very easy process from beginning to end

VERY disappointed. Extremely poor quality...runner was like "furry paint!" It arrived damaged...two spots that received no dye and were white as though bleach had been splashed on the rug. Wrote the company upon arrival, took pictures and now, a week later, there is no resolution. Have previously ordered from competitors and have been pleased. Will not order from this company again. Waiting for an answer!
The rugs are very, very thin. No pile whatsoever. The price is good, but I expected some thickness, it’s basically not a rug. The color is good, but is it worth it?
Easy order and  fast delivery.  Love the rug’s  color and texture.  Will order again.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for sharing your experience! It really motivates us to keep going :)

review.comment:
Rug was rolled so tightly that is has permanent ripples in it.  Have tried everything to get them out without luck.
Binding on one side has many lose threads.
Not at all happy with the look of this rug.
The ordering part was easy and seamless. I’ll let you know about the delivery time and product quality when the rug arrives!
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for sharing Cheryl, your support means the world to us!

review.comment: Quick and easy....no shipping! Yay!
review.review_reply: Yaaaay :) we're so happy to know that you had a great experience!

review.comment:
I ordered this area rug off the internet with some trepidation.  Rugs2Go? okay.  What I first liked as I browsed the site was the option to get a flat weave.  I have dogs and vacuuming is key.  The designs offered were good too for my style so I decided to give it a try.
I ordered a flat weave oriental style and the corresponding under pad for a very good price.  I was as I said, pretty skeptical, but I needed a rug. What I received was excellent communication, not only a confirmation, but care instructions immediately, quick delivery, the rug was on my stoop in jut over a week and a beautiful product.  The rug is good looking, well made and exactly as it looked on my screen.  It lays flat, cleans up nice and is just what I wanted.
The protective pad is felted on one side and non-skid on the other and fits perfectly.
I'm really happy with the purchase.  I don't often write a review but I really did have my doubts and felt I needed to sing some praises for this site and for my purchase.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with the purchase and the product! It really does make everyone here happy and excited to know that we could add a little joy to your home!

review.comment: Spectacular array of choices. Beautiful products. Excellent prices
review.review_reply: We really appreciate you sharing your experience, thanks a lot from the entire Rugs2Go team!

review.comment: Great service and price, love the rug.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for sharing your experience!

review.comment:
Rugs2Go are fantastic to do business with. I own several rugs from them and they are so beautiful. Our rugs face three kids and pets daily and still look great, SO DURABLE! If we need a rug there's no other option for our family. Great customer service,  low prices, and shipping is fast and free. We love Rugs2Go.

The Smith Family
review.review_reply: Thanks so much Smiths! We're all really happy to know the rugs are working out well for you guys :)

review.comment: I was supposed to receive my two new rugs today. No delivery or explanation
Love this rug.  Colors were beautiful,   ordered wrong size, didn’t return too hard to repackage as required so ended up giving it as gift

Great choices, affordable, good materials for the rugs (I avoid polyethylene) and very easy to shop. Customer service helped me with something right away after ordering. Cannot wait to receive the rugs! They look like art :)
Excellent service snd follow up
review.review_reply: Thanks for sharing your positive experience!

review.comment: Better quality than I anticipated for the price!
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for sharing, we love surprising customers with our rugs :)

review.comment: The rug gave me a rash. I don't know what chemical is on it, but I got a rash from the rug.  Also, the color of the rugs do not match the image online.  It is not the difference between wether you have a Mac or PC it is the online marketing department photoshopping the image to turn up the saturation, contrast, black point and other parameters to make the rugs pop on your screen, makes them look better.  I now know this after buying one and seeing it in person.  I also have a degree in graphic design and know what using those parameters do to a picture.  So unfortunately the color and vibrance is not the same as what you see online.  Also, if you have an issue as I do, you have to pay for the shipping back in order to return it.  Yep, not until you dig to make a return do find this out.

the rug looks great, the colors are true to what you see online.
it is a great accent piece. the rug is a bit on the light/thin side and you will need a underliner so that it does not move around. I am very happy with my purchase.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for sharing your experience! We're really happy to know the rug worked out for you!

review.comment: great selection and value look forward to getting the rug soon!
